body_html:
Im getting the following error while trying to build so file

Unexpected error reading .blazerc file '/Users/Johnny/Downloads/tensorflow-master/.tf_configure.bazelrc'

Following is the command that I tried,
bazel build -c opt //tensorflow/contrib/android:libtensorflow_inference.so --crosstool_top=//external:android/crosstool --host_crosstool_top=@bazel_tools//tools/cpp:toolchain --cpu=armeabi-v7a
body_text:
Im getting the following error while trying to build so file

Unexpected error reading .blazerc file '/Users/Johnny/Downloads/tensorflow-master/.tf_configure.bazelrc'

Following is the command that I tried,
 bazel build -c opt //tensorflow/contrib/android:libtensorflow_inference.so    --crosstool_top=//external:android/crosstool    --host_crosstool_top=@bazel_tools//tools/cpp:toolchain    --cpu=armeabi-v7a
body:
Im getting the following error while trying to build `so` file

> Unexpected error reading .blazerc file '/Users/Johnny/Downloads/tensorflow-master/.tf_configure.bazelrc'

Following is the command that I tried,
`
bazel build -c opt //tensorflow/contrib/android:libtensorflow_inference.so    --crosstool_top=//external:android/crosstool    --host_crosstool_top=@bazel_tools//tools/cpp:toolchain    --cpu=armeabi-v7a`
